mapper.select: SELECT agent_contract_price_info.id, agent_contract_price_info.goods_id, goods.name AS goods_name, agent_contract_price_info.goods_specification_id, goods_specification.name AS goods_specification_name, goods_specification.agent_price, agent_contract_price_info.contract_price FROM agent_contract_price_info LEFT OUTER JOIN goods ON goods.id = agent_contract_price_info.goods_id LEFT OUTER JOIN goods_specification ON goods_specification.id = agent_contract_price_info.goods_specification_id WHERE agent_contract_price_info.agent_contract_id = #{agentContractId} AND agent_contract_price_info.deleted = 0;
